QPFLibrary namespace
Functions
getGeneralInfoGet general parameters from the configuration
setLastAccessUpdates the date of last access to the configuration
getProductTypesReturn vector of product type identifiers
getNumOrchRulesReturn number of orchestration rules
getOrchRuleReturn orchestration rule parameters
getNumProcsReturn number of processors
getProcReturn processor parameters
getNumNodesReturn number of nodes
getNodeReturn node parameters
getNodeByNameReturn node parameters for a node with the name specified
getHMINodeNameReturn HMI node name
applyNewConfigGet new configuration information from an external (JSON) file
setConfigFileSet configuration file name
readConfigurationFromFileLoads the configuration file content into memory
readConfigurationFromDBLoads the configuration from the DB into memory
saveConfigurationToDBStore the configuration into the DB
